comments.body: Makes sense! Off topic: I have checked this with the bug I have with https://github.com/mdemarne/scalameta/blob/f0aeadf75fe49a5f009160b1a06ce9e3620ff60f/tests/src/test/scala/tql/TQLOriginSuite.scala, and it's going through there, so I would think that somehow something is not done properly in copying a tree, i.e. https://github.com/mdemarne/scalameta/blob/master/scalameta/src/main/scala/scala/meta/internal/tql/TraverserHelper.scala#L25 is sometimes true; the tree has changed (even with collect { ... } which copies the tree as is in https://github.com/mdemarne/scalameta/blob/master/scalameta/src/main/scala/scala/meta/tql/Combinators.scala#L174).
